group_1.narration: [textBlack:Dear Miss Kirino,]
[textBlack:I really wanted to talk to you in person,@but today's performance was my last day at this school,@so I'm sorry I had to write to you instead.]
[textBlack:I've always thought you were really cool,@always showing consideration for your surroundings@and being kind to everyone with a smile on your face.]
[textBlack:I'm a little regretful that I couldn't approach you much,@since you have such a prominent reputation@as a proper young lady...]
[textBlack:I wish we could have talked more before I moved.]
[textBlack:If we meet again someday, somewhere,@I'd be happy if we could talk then.]

group_1.textCenter: What's with "Miss Kirino"...and what's this@about moving...
I never heard anything about this...

group_1.narration: I can't stand this anymore...

group_1.textRight: You're here, Sae.

group_1.textLeft: Kyubey...

group_1.textRight: It appears your Soul Gem is starting to@get cloudy.

group_1.textLeft: Soul Gem...?

group_1.textRight: You should probably go hunt a Witch.
It seems there's one nearby.

group_1.textLeft: ...Fine, I get it.

group_1.textRight: What's the matter with that letter?

group_1.textLeft: ...Something's weird.
We're best friends, but she wrote to me@like we're strangers.
Hinano and Maria, too...@Everyone's acting weird...

group_1.textRight: Perhaps...
This is a result of your wish?

group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.textRight: "I want everyone at school to believe that@I'm the daughter of a respectable family."
That was your wish, correct?
Then your wish must have affected@every student attending the school.
And as a result...
If there's been a change to your relationships@with your friends,
it wouldn't be surprising.

group_1.textLeft: ...Right, I get it now.
It affected how everyone in school sees me...@And so...
Ugh... I'm such an idiot.
Enough of that for now...
There's a place I want to stop by for a bit.
When I'm done with that, you better@give me a proper explanation.
You mentioned stuff about Witches and@Soul Gems that bothers me.

group_1.textRight: Of course, that was my intention.

group_1.narration: There was never a meaningful reason for us to be here@in the first place.
The only thing that everyone there had in common@was that "they knew my true face".

group_1.textCenter: True. We know about Sae's unsightly side,@and we hang out here.
That's about the only thing we have in common.
If we hadn't connected here, we might've@remained strangers.

group_1.narration: Without knowing my true, impoverished self,@we wouldn't have connected, and as Hinano said,@we would have remained strangers.
Now that the real me@has completely disappeared from the school,@there's nothing left to connect us.
My wish erased the relationships I had with everyone,@so that all they would remember was the false "me,"@the daughter of a respectable family.
I don't fully understand how the magic works,@but I'm sure that any trace of our@relationship in this classroom after school@was completely erased after all the fabrication.
So much for cherishing my friends and family...@My family was the only one I paid attention to.@And I could only protect one of them.
In the end,@it turns out that I was completely blind.
All those people who understood me,@who cheered me on...
...Those closest to me, who supported me the most...@I never realized how precious they were to me.

group_1.textCenter: (So this must be my punishment for being@such a fool...)

group_1.textRight: Regardless, your wish was unexpected.

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: Well, given your family's circumstances,
I would have expected you to wish for a@direct improvement to your financial situation.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:305501:cheek_0][chara:305501:face_mtn_ex_000.exp.json][chara:305501:motion_300][chara:305501:lipSynch_1]Oh...
Right... I don't know why I didn't wish for that...
And you too.
You could have suggested that to me.

group_1.textRight: It's your own wish.
I wouldn't make a suggestion.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, I see. That's your stance, huh?
You're just a crooked salesman.

group_1.textRight: Your wish has been granted.
As a Magical Girl, you need to fulfill your duties.

group_1.textLeft: I received plenty of shocks, but now@I'm starting to calm down.
It's fine, I can climb with my own strength.
(That's why I have no choice but to@give up on them...)

group_1.textRight: Sae, we're almost to the Labyrinth.@You should transform.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.
(If I told her that I became a Magical Girl...)
(I'm sure she would say it makes great material...@and her eyes would light up...)

group_1.textRight: I'm surprised, Sae.
I didn't expect you to defeat a Witch so easily@in your first fight.

group_1.narration: *Huff*... Is it over?
It's going to be a pain in the ass to beat these things@on a regular basis, but it's nice that it's going to dramatically@improve my athletic performance.
I'll be able to do more manual labor than before,@and it opens a wider range of options for part-time jobs.

group_1.textRight: Strange, I'm pretty sure I felt magic@over here.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, you're the one from earlier...
Oh...
...Good evening.

group_1.textRight: Oh my, you were also a Magical Girl...!
